titleInfo.title: Uncle Dave Macon 100th Birthday Anniversary Party - Country Music Hall of Fame - 1970-10-07

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The file may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. End users must obtain all required permissions or consents from the owners of such rights. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Recording of an anniversary party for Uncle Dave Macon's 100th birthday, from October 7, 1970, 11:00 AM, located at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum. Program includes Frank Jones (host/speaker), Minnie Pearl (speaker), Tennessee Ernie Ford (speaker), Roy Acuff (speaker), Mayor Beverly Briley (speaker), Fiddlin' Sid Harkreader (speaker/performer), Jo Walker (speaker), and Harold Hitt (speaker).

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
